𓋩 Shera@SEM 𓊃𓂝𓎛𓋩𓏛
𓋩 sacha 𓋴𓇋𓎛𓃶 => 𓋴𓍊𓐍 samnk
𓋩 sankt 𓃶𓋹
𓋩 saxa™ Sacret secret 𓋩
𓋩 KETTe 𓐍𓏏𓋩

𓐍 𓏏 𓋩 خَاتَم ḵātam “seal ring” => 𓇥 end

𓋴 𓍑 𓏏 𓅱 𓋩 | seal | sinetti signet sigillum signum “sign”
𓋴 𓍑 𓏏 𓅱 𓋩 | seal | Stempel

ش ر ف sharif honor, noble => sir ≠ sheriff (shire + reeve < scīr ġerēfa:(Kur)Graf 𐌲𐌰𐌲𐍂𐌴𐍆𐍄𐍃 γρᾰ́φω )

𓋴 𓂝 𓎛 𓋩||rank, dignity, dignities (Plural), honours (Plural)| sharif ⇔ Sacre Sankt 𓋩 𓃶
𓋴 𓂝 𓎛 𓋩 sharif => 𓋩 ⋍ Reif, der
𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 nobles syrier sharifa : officials @ shar
